name: sugarloaf shrug
notes:
free instructions written for my recently-finished self-drafted poncho. this design is inspired by the beautiful work at [toast][1], and i knit this as an upcoming holiday gift for my mom. i wanted to share the results/instructions with those who may be interested in knitting a similar garment! 

please feel free to tag me on instagram @stitching_stone or #sugarloafshrug so that i can see your progress and your completed projects :~)

**note:** this pattern has not been tech edited or tested, and errors and omissions are likely! should you have any questions or notice any issues with the pattern, please feel free to get in touch here or on instagram (@stitching_stone)!


  [1]: https://us.toa.st/collections/womens-knitwear/products/lofty-alpaca-blend-knitted-poncho-olive
